From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

>::Prowl::
>
>Prowl dodges Wildrider this time, firing two missiles at him. His
>nunchuks flip out, the two ends coming together and extending to form
>a supercharged staff.
>
>"We'll see who dies here, Predacon," he replies, the mention of
>Autobot Prowl nagging on his mind. There was something important
>about it, but he couldn't quite remember.

Wildrider transforms after this miss, and Cannonballs, as he was expecting
the missile fire. He lands on the ground, and is propelled forward by the
explosion of the missiles beside him. He gets up, and whatever was left of
his dangeling wires from his head had fallen off. His exostructure was
rippe apart, all that was left was the insides of the right side, his left
side of his face was not badly damaged. He starts to laugh deeply, and
turns into a cackle. "Ha ha ha, me a Predacon, thats rich Maximal, ha ha,"
with that he raises his scatterblaster rifle and pulls the trigger twice,
sending 16 lasers a ripping the air where Prowl is.
